item.title: Main EU Markets for co-located projects
item.description: UK The main drivers for implements hybrid projects in the UK are: Advanced grid services: The UK comprises the most advanced standalone battery storage market in Europe, having pioneered since 2017 through the proliferation of grid-services. Mature Industry: Due to vast commercialization expertise, the industry is the most welcoming when it comes to innovation such as co-located assets and Hybrid PPAs. The UK is Europe’s largest energy storage market – by far.
